version_description:
Ascension: Rise of Vigil is now available for purchase.
5 New Achievements when playing with the Ascension: Rise of Vigil expansion.
•Fixed various bugs in the rules for the Rise of Vigil expansion.
All new Darkness Unleashed expansion available for purchase!  Play now!

* Fixed a confirmation popup that would crash the game
* Rules change to prevent Toric from copying himself from the Center Row
* Other minor bug fixes

* Fixed the warning popup for Cosmic Protocol and The Great Eclipse
* Fixed cost limiting when defeating monsters from the Void
* Fixed a rematch display bug
* Made a change to allow the Next Game button to load completed games
* Corrected the number of Terrorizing Fiends in the Realms Unraveled deck
Bug fixes
* Added a new digital only expansion - Promo Pack 5 - which introduces Portal cards to the Center Deck and several faction cards that interact with the Portals.
* Bug fixes

**Dreamscape Expansion Now Available!**

Step into the Dreamscape, a plane of visions and imagination created in the wake of New Vigil’s transformation. As the factions gain insight into the new world’s power, they must also be on guard for those who might abuse it for their own nefarious ends. Join the heroes of New Vigil as they explore the exciting possibilities that await them in the Dreamscape!

- Fixed bug related to drawing entire Dream deck when adding a card to your Dreamscape.
- Fixed purchasing for Dreamscape expansion when Bundle is already owned.
- Possible fix for issue related to streaming textures for Dreamscape cards.
Fixed several crash bugs related to Dreamscape cards.

**War of Shadows Expansion Now Available!**
 
A new darkness seeps into New Vigil from the Void, intent on restoring despair and desolation to a world that has forgotten it.
The four factions recall their veteran heroes and reawaken the great war machines of the past, as they plan their first in the chaotic ebb and flow of light and dark.
The War of Shadows has begun!

* New dual-cost Heroes and Constructs require players to use both resources to acquire them, but have incredible power!
* As the balance between Light and Dark shifts, cards gain additional powers depending on whether it’s Night or Day!
* Playable as a stand-alone 1-4 player game, or combine with other Ascension games!
Fixed an issue where effects that referenced a card's cost weren't handling dual cost cards correctly.
Discover Ascension's new expansion, 'Gift of the Elements', which brings new cards, new rules and new mechanisms to incorporate even more strategy!

- Several achievements have been fixed
- Numerous interface optimizations, should lead to less battery drain on mobiles
- Online matchmaking and game creation fixes
- FAQ button fixed
- Several crashes fixed
- Various additional fixes

- iPad 3 & 4 compatibility fixes
- Fixes forfeited games in the active game list
- Multiple fixes for drag and drop
- Fixed void tray auto extending in some situations
- Fixed inner glow display on played cards
- Game cells now shows player names in turn order once the game has started
- Keen-Eyed Aspirant has been added back into the deck list for Gift of the Elements
- Increased hit area for the delete button on game list cells
- Fixed crash when more than 31 constructs were in the local player's construct tray
- Various additional fixes
- Minor boot fixes on iPad

- Promo Pack #6
- Various Fixes

- Delirium Release
- Asmodée SSO
- Fix for the Leprechaun card
Discover the new expansion Ascension: Valley of the Ancients and enjoy new mechanisms and new rules to fight your opponents! Who will claim the Temples and collect the keystones ?

- Fixes crash on iOS 12
- Fixes rare layout issues
- Various minor fixes

New online account login; fixed specific device issues.
Thanks for playing Ascension! This update contains performance improvements as well as fixes for specific devices and online play.
Fixed an issue with notification text; additional bug fixes and improvements.
